title: Become a Black Screen in a Novel - Novel Updates
tags: Charismatic Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Dungeons   Elves   Fantasy World   Gods   Heroes   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Hunters   Level System   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Multiple Protagonists   Proactive Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sword Wielder   Transformation Ability   Transported to Another World
author: 유래향
description:
My favorite novel is complete.

“How to survive in a superhuman school”, abbreviated as “super massacre”.

It is a work in which the author enters his novel and struggles to survive.
There, I, a reader, came in. According to the author, if you look at the ending, everything gained from this place becomes a reality, but if you die on the way, it's all in vain.

If so, the survivors would have to live till the end. And take everything they can.

No matter how bad the original story is, no matter how many people die, you persevere in hiding.

......In the end, if I kill the Demon King, I win.>
